abstract: Defense Department confirms death of one American service member who has died as part of Afghanistan war and its operations.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 2,349 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 2,349 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
